mapper.select: SELECT c.id activity_class_id, cl.name activity_class_name, t.id activity_type_id, tl.name activity_type_name, a.id activity_id, al.name activity_name, a.male_par, a.female_par FROM activity_type c, activity_type_lang cl, activity_type t, activity_type_lang tl, activity a, activity_lang al WHERE c.id = cl.activity_type_id AND t.id = tl.activity_type_id AND a.id = al.activity_id AND c.id = t.activity_class_id AND t.id = a.activity_type_id AND c.active = 1 AND cl.lang = #{lang} AND tl.lang = #{lang} AND al.lang = #{lang}

SELECT c.id activity_class_id, cl.name activity_class_name, t.id activity_type_id, tl.name activity_type_name, a.id activity_id, al.name activity_name, a.male_par, a.female_par FROM activity_type c, activity_type_lang cl, activity_type t, activity_type_lang tl, activity a, activity_lang al WHERE c.id = cl.activity_type_id AND t.id = tl.activity_type_id AND a.id = al.activity_id AND c.id = t.activity_class_id AND t.id = a.activity_type_id AND cl.lang = #{lang} AND tl.lang = #{lang} AND al.lang = #{lang} AND a.id IN (1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 9)
